message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 3-3-2, translated into en
data: TB surveillance data are assessed systematically through so-called epidemiological reviews, which provide data quality scores used to update plans for strengthening TB surveillance and are used in models to estimate the burden of TB. In addition, the data are reviewed internally for consistency. Data and estimates are published in the form of country profiles, which are published following their review by countries, as mentioned in previous sections and cited in section 7. Results are published in detail in publicly available annual global TB reports.
